short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SociaLook enables you and your colleagues to share interesting content about your company on social media.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SociaLook helps you increase your company’s social media potential, by empowering your employees talk more about the company on their personal social media networks. It allows managers and employees suggest news to their fellow colleagues, which can easily be shared on social media.

Features:
- Access a feed of company related news
- Suggest news to your colleagues about the company
- Share the news to your personal networks
- Access to company-wide Leaderboards
- Rich analytics (No. Shares, Clicks, engagement, top ambassadors, etc.)

Benefits:
- Efficiently scale your company’s social media efforts
- Attract new hires from social media
- Promote new products
